text: @realDonaldTrump @POTUS Do Nothing Democrats, that's funny.  When it is you, who've abdicated power over the coronavirus, it is the GOP leadership that does nothing but protect your sorry fat ass.  You don't represent Americans, you only represent yourself & your megadonors.  So piss off!
